code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getJob}from"../store/actions/JobActions";import Job from"../components/Job";var JobDetail=function JobDetail(){var _useParams=useParams(),jobId=_useParams.jobId;var dispatch=useDispatch();var job=useSelector(function(state){return state.job;});useEffect(function(){return dispatch(getJob(jobId));},[jobId]);if(job==null){return React.createElement("h3",null,"Loading job ...");}else{return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement(Job,{job:job}));}};export default JobDetail;
